thread.section_title: Oh Hello Clothing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oh Hello Clothing | ohelloclothing.com
thread.title: Ciara Cowman
thread.title_full: Oh Hello Clothing reviewed by Ciara Cowman

author: Ciara Cowman
title: Ciara Cowman
text: I've only had one order gone wrong with yourselves and you were very nice about it and understanding and dealt with the problem straight away so I'm still quite happy with ordering from your website ! You are very efficient and kept sending me updates on my order and I didn't have to worry about where it was or if it was going to arrive, which was great!! Very happy with the service overall.
